sentences.en: " But of course, " the captain said. " To begin with, I use an awl. "
sentences.cn: “ 好吧, ” 上尉说道, “ 首先, 我用的工具是钻子. ”

sentences.en: Again he drove the awl and needle into her.
sentences.cn: 他便又一次掏出锥子和针，要扎她。

sentences.en: An awl or pick for extracting letters from set type.
sentences.cn: 从字板上抽取字母的铗子.

sentences.en: AWL algorithm is also superior to other LRU improved algorithms.
sentences.cn: AWL算法 与其它LRU改进算法相比也具有很大的优势.

sentences.en: Baba Mustapha was seated with an awl in his hand, just going to work.
sentences.cn: 巴巴木沙发坐着手里拿着一个锥子，正在工作。

sentences.en: Due to the single output, the best compaction ratio can Awl - compactor.
sentences.cn: 由于该电路是单输出的, 所以总能保证最大压缩率.

sentences.en: For instance, awl thread, ladder - shaped thread and triangle thread etc.
sentences.cn: 例如, 锥螺纹 、 梯形螺纹、三角螺纹等.

sentences.en: He works with a file, a chisel, and an awl.
sentences.cn: 他工作起来又用锉刀, 又用凿子, 又用锥子.

sentences.en: I accidentally broke the upper end of the awl.
sentences.cn: 我一不小心把这个锥桯子折断了.

sentences.en: It was fun to play with an awl.
sentences.cn: 玩钻子是件很有趣的事.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the operation effect of simple awl cranium drainage in treating chronic subdural hematoma.
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨单纯锥颅引流治疗慢性硬膜下血肿手术疗效.

sentences.en: T 2 rotary awl cover is a kind of structural member that has been applied extensively.
sentences.cn: T2铜材回转锥型罩是一种被广泛应用的结构件.

sentences.en: The awl point can get into between teeth easily without cracking, having the function of toothpick.
sentences.cn: 韧性锥尖轻松进入牙缝,不折裂, 可代替牙签使用.

sentences.en: then his master must take him before the judges. He shall take him to the door or the doorpost and pierce his ear with an awl.
sentences.cn: 他的主人就要带他到审判官（或作：上帝；下同）那里，又要带他到门前，靠近门框，用锥子穿他的耳朵，他就永远服事主人。

sentences.en: Then suddenly, he thought of the awl which is used to make shoes.
sentences.cn: 情急之下, 他想到了老伴纳鞋底用的锥子.

sentences.en: Therefore , i order to eliminate drowsiness, Shu Qin kept an awl by his side.
sentences.cn: 苏秦为了驱除睡意, 便将一把锥子放在身边.

sentences.en: These two teams are about the same strength , which is like a pin against an awl.
sentences.cn: 为了抗击外国的侵略,他们自发组成志愿军.

sentences.en: When Louis was three, he tried to use his father's awl.
sentences.cn: 路易斯三岁时, 就学着用他爸爸的锥子.

trans.tran_en: a pointed tool for making holes in leather
